meanings.definition: A stalk or stem of a fungus.
meanings.sent1: The forest floor was covered with tiny stipites of mushrooms.
meanings.sent2: The biologist studied the stipites of various fungi under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the stipites as tiny umbrellas during the rain.
meanings.sent4: The stipites of the mushrooms stood tall like miniature trees in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The delicate stipites of the fungus swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: A column or pillar in architecture.
meanings.sent1: The ancient temple was supported by massive stipites carved from stone.
meanings.sent2: The architect carefully measured the stipites to ensure they were perfectly aligned.
meanings.sent3: The pigeons perched on the stipites of the building, looking like tiny guardians.
meanings.sent4: The grand hall was adorned with golden stipites that gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The marble stipites of the courthouse added a sense of grandeur to the entrance.
